00043 #ifndef __SoundConnection_H
00044 #define __SoundConnection_H
00045 
00046 #include <osg/Node>
00047 #include <lo/lo_types.h> // for lo_message
00048 #include "spinUtil.h" // for t_symbol
00049 
00050 namespace spin
00051 {
00052 
00053 class SceneManager;
00054 class DSPNode;
00055 
00056 enum connectionType { NORMAL, NODE_TO_SPACE, SPACE_TO_NODE };
00057 
00067 class SoundConnection : virtual public osg::Node
00068 {
00069  
00070     public:
00071         SoundConnection(SceneManager *s, osg::ref_ptr<DSPNode> src, osg::ref_ptr<DSPNode> snk);
00072         ~SoundConnection();
00073 
00074         std::string getID() { return std::string(id_->s_name); }
00075         
00076         void setThru (int newvalue);
00077         void setDistanceEffect (float newvalue);
00078         void setRolloffEffect (float newvalue);
00079         void setDopplerEffect (float newvalue);
00080         void setDiffractionEffect (float newvalue);
00081         
00082         int   getThru() const { return (int) thru; };
00083         float getDistanceEffect() const { return distanceEffect; };
00084         float getRolloffEffect() const { return rolloffEffect; };
00085         float getDopplerEffect() const { return dopplerEffect; };
00086         float getDiffractionEffect() const { return diffractionEffect; };
00087 
00088         
00089         void debug();
00090         virtual std::vector<lo_message> getState() const;
00091         virtual void stateDump();
00092         virtual void stateDump(lo_address addr);
00093         
00094         // ************
00095     
00096         
00097         // These are pointers to the nodes for this connection:
00098         //osg::ref_ptr<DSPNode> source, sink;
00099         DSPNode *source, *sink;
00100     
00101         
00102     private:
00103         
00104         t_symbol *id_;
00105 
00106         // The modifiable parameters of the connection (allows for bending the rules
00107         // of physical modelling):
00108         bool thru;
00109         float distanceEffect;
00110         float rolloffEffect;
00111         float dopplerEffect;
00112         float diffractionEffect;
00113         
00114         
00115         SceneManager *sceneManager_;
00116 
00117 };
00118 
00119 } // end of namespace spin
